scripts.images:compress: mkdir -p public/.optimized/images public/.optimized/logos && imagemin 'public/images/*.{png,PNG}' --plugin=pngquant --out-dir='public/.optimized/images' && imagemin 'public/images/*.{jpg,jpeg,JPG,JPEG}' --plugin=mozjpeg --out-dir='public/.optimized/images' && imagemin 'public/logos/*.{png,PNG}' --plugin=pngquant --out-dir='public/.optimized/logos' && rsync -a public/.optimized/images/ public/images/ && rsync -a public/.optimized/logos/ public/logos/ && rm -rf public/.optimized
